item.title: Premier Energies Ltd Sees Notable Surge in Derivatives Open Interest Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: Premier Energies Ltd (NSE: PREMIERENE), a mid-cap player in the Other Electrical Equipment sector, has witnessed a significant 11.8% rise in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. item.title: DJ Mediaprint & Logistics Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure

item.title: AKI India Ltd Plunges to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of AKI India Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Gems, Jewellery and Watches sector, plunged sharply on 24 Feb 2026, hitting the lower circuit limit as panic selling gripped the stock. Time: 24 minutes ago
